original_title:
Special Prosecutor Ed Martin  privately called on NY AG Letitia James to RESIGN amid the criminal investigation into her for mortgage fraud. 

She refused.

So now, she’s going to be met with the FULL FORCE of the law!  — The Donald
article_summary: Special Prosecutor Ed Martin has called for New York AG Letitia James' resignation over a mortgage fraud investigation. She refused, and is now facing a full investigation. The case is gaining attention online with calls to "Lock Them Up."</s>
